description: This PHP source file handles AJAX requests related to port triggering configuration in a network device. It includes functions for adding, editing, enabling/disabling, and deleting port trigger entries, as well as conflict checking with port forwarding rules. The code interacts with device-specific configuration structures via setStr, getStr, addTblObj, delTblObj, and related functions.

methods.name: PORTTEST
methods.description: Checks if two port ranges overlap or are within each other, returning 1 if overlapping, 0 otherwise.
